name: places/ChIJBUc10glZwokRtUTa9yufyI0
formattedAddress: 670 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 670 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Kil is by far the best dermatologist I’ve ever had the pleasure of meeting. She is kind, extremely knowledgeable, efficient and very reasonably priced if you do a procedure that isn’t covered by insurance. She has top of the line equipment and the office is beautiful. I recently visited Dr. Kil regarding a growth on my nose that 3 different dermatologists & celebrity esthetician said couldn’t be removed without substantial scarring. Dr. Kil proved them all wrong, and did the procedure in less than 10 minutes! Wishing the best of luck to this extremely talented and kind doctor.

originalText.text: Dr. Kil is a phenomenal dermatologist. She’s incredibly knowledgeable, thoughtful and just genuinely good at what she does. (She also recommended me to an exceptional facialist)   Couldn’t recommend New Bloom/ Dr. Kil enough!

text.text: Dr. Kil is a phenomenal dermatologist. She’s incredibly knowledgeable, thoughtful and just genuinely good at what she does. (She also recommended me to an exceptional facialist)   Couldn’t recommend New Bloom/ Dr. Kil enough!

originalText.text: Dr. Kil is an excellent Dermatologist. Her bed manners and professionalism is superb. Very detailing and sincere with her answers. Dr. Kil has been our family Doctor for over 6 years and my daughters love her. Highly recommended.

text.text: Dr. Kil is an excellent Dermatologist. Her bed manners and professionalism is superb. Very detailing and sincere with her answers. Dr. Kil has been our family Doctor for over 6 years and my daughters love her. Highly recommended.

originalText.text: Dr. Kil is an amazing dermatologist. She is very knowledgeable and provided me with an effective treatment for my skin concerns. She was also able to permanently treat one of my skin concerns that my previously dermatologist couldn’t. I would highly recommend Dr. Kil and New Bloom Dermatology.

text.text: Dr. Kil is an amazing dermatologist. She is very knowledgeable and provided me with an effective treatment for my skin concerns. She was also able to permanently treat one of my skin concerns that my previously dermatologist couldn’t. I would highly recommend Dr. Kil and New Bloom Dermatology.

originalText.text: I wish I had discovered Dr. Kil sooner as her treatments have helped improve my condition. In addition to being an excellent dermatologist, her office/practice is very efficient and professional. Appointments are always on time, front desk receptionist very nice to work with and a pleasant zen ambiance of the beautiful design/decor of her office.
